item.title: President of India nominated Veerendra Heggade, P.T. Usha, Ilaiyaraaja and V. Vijayendra Prasad to the Rajya Sabha
item.description: According to the Fourth Schedule (Articles 4(1) and 80(2)) of the Constitution of India, The President of India can nominate 12 members to Rajya Sabha for a term of six-years for their contributions towards Arts, Literature, Sciences, and Social Services. Maybe earlier most of the South Indian peoples, for this matter all the Indian people might not be aware that The President of India can nomina
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
